td.content: s:a male aged 38 Ys presents with increased Heart over 3 years. he drinks alcohol occasionally he has approx. a 30 pack/year history of smoking o:Height 66 in, Weight 128 lbs, Temperature 99.3 F, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 18 a:Bradycardia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed atropine - 1 mg IV every 5 minutes as needed for symptomatic bradyarrhythmia, and ordered ECG.

s:38 year old white male with C/O moderate shortness of breath for 4 weeks that is frequent. ocas ETOH on w/e patient reports that he smokes once or twice daily o:Height 65 in, Weight 122 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 62, Respiration 14, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Shortness of Breath p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed OMS - 50 DEMAND OXYGEN via non-rebreather mask, and ordered Arterial Blood Gas, duplex US of leg.
